column1: Topic title: 了解真相，童婚和先奸后婚 是政治，还是清真文化

column3: 童婚和先奸后婚大家必须清楚认识，这是到底政治，还是阿拉伯清真文化因素 ！？根据圣战观察组织的文章，它们是这样说的 ：Marrying young girls was not all that unusual for its time, but because in Islam Muhammad is the supreme example of conduct (cf. Qur’an 33:21), he is considered exemplary in this unto today. And so in April 2011, the Bangladesh Mufti Fazlul Haque Amini declared that those trying to pass a law banning child marriage in that country were putting Muhammad in a bad light: “Banning child marriage will cause challenging the marriage of the holy prophet of Islam, [putting] the moral character of the prophet into controversy and challenge.” He added a threat: “Islam permits child marriage and it will not be tolerated if any ruler will ever try to touch this issue in the name of giving more rights to women.” The Mufti said that 200,000 jihadists were ready to sacrifice their lives for any law restricting child marriage.和年幼女孩结婚不是不寻常的，但因在伊斯兰教中，穆罕默德是行为的最高榜样（参考古兰经33:21），他被认为是今天教徒的典范。所以在2011年4月，孟加拉祭司 Mufti Fazlul Haque Amini 重申，那些试图通过禁止童婚法律的人人士正在把穆罕默德放在一个不好的光线：“禁止童婚将会挑战伊斯兰圣洁先知的婚姻，将先知的道德品质引入争议和挑战 ”。   他威胁说 ：“伊斯兰教允许童婚，任何政府以赋予妇女更多权利，试图触碰这个课题，这是不能容忍的 ”Mufti说，20万圣战者已经准备好为任何限制童婚的法律牺牲。Malaysia: Muslim MP and former Sharia court judge says 9-year-olds can marry and rapists can marry victimshttps://www.jihadwatch.org/2017/ ... s-can-marry-victims
